pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pychromedriver## Installation:```# From PyPIpip install pychromedriver```## Usage:```from selenium import webdriverfrom selenium.webdriver.chrome.service import Servicefrom pychromedriver import chromedriver_pathbs = webdriver.Chrome(service=Service(chromedriver_path))bs.get('https://www.pypi.org')```
